original_text: Jesus replied, ‘I must go to other towns to tell everyone the good news. I will tell them how God rules in the lives of his people. That is what God sent me to do.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 내가 다른 동네들에서도 하나님의 나라 복음을 전하여야 하리니 나는 이 일을 위해 보내심을 받았노라 하시고

sentences.original_text: to tell everyone the good news.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람에게 좋은 소식을 전하기 위해서다

sentences.original_text: in the lives of his people.
That is what God sent me to do.'
